Object Shape: Cigar, Cylinder, Diamond, Disc, Oval, Square, Rectagular, Star-like, Triangle
Summary: AMAZING REOCCURANCE OF UFO ACTIVITY NIGHTLY
divs: Sighting DetailsFirst of all,keep the job up Arizona ufo spotter!Forget about the debunkers!You have inspired me to tell my continuous nightly(after sunset)sighting experiences as of late.(1)8-10 months ago,the objects started as disc shaped it seemed.I had binoculars,but they were at such a distance,I couldn't make them out clearly enough.They had the blinking blue,red,green,yellow lights on them.I call them Watcher's,as they are here practically every night at basically the same part of the sky.(2)Beginning about 2 or 3 months ago,they changed to a purple gold twinkling diamond shaped objects.Directly in the center of them horizonally, is a slim black observation deck going all the way across.You can see an exact object like the one I seen on YOU TUBE by searching October 2007 UFO.Also lately,have been objects with white lights.The pattern of the white lights was: blink, blink blink blink, blink. Some I have watched have dipped below tree lines slowly decending towards the ground.The other one's that travel a couple of thousand feet up in the air at one point seem to be going at a constant movement,will suddenly skip forward much quicker at intervals while it is flying.Truely,something strange is going on in the skies above us.Keep an eye out folks,WE ARE NOT ALONE! SEEN ALL OF THIS WITH MY SISTER MOST OF THE TIME ON A WRAP AROUND PORCH OF OUR RAISED HOUSE.WE WERE UFO HUNTING.WE STILL TO THIS DAY KEEP FEELING AMAZED TO SEE THESE THINGS CONTINUING.MY FEELINGS ARE NEITHER OF FRET OR GOOD.I HOPE THEY ARE GOOD THOUGH.THANKS-----
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Slidell
There were no other sightings in Slidell on or around November 18th 2007
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
